file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: HPI-Schul-Cloud me Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the HPI-Schul-Cloud me service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0

components:
  securitySchemes:
    jwtBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  schemas:
    consent:
      type: object
      properties:
        userConsent:
          type: object
          properties:
            form:
              type: string
              enum: ['analog', 'digital', 'update']
            source:
              type: string
            dateOfPrivacyConsent:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            privacyConsent:
              type: boolean
            dateOfTermsOfUseConsent:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            termsOfUseConsent:
              type: boolean
        parentConsents:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              form:
                type: string
                enum: ['analog', 'digital', 'update']
              source:
                type: string
              dateOfPrivacyConsent:
                type: string
                format: date-time
              privacyConsent:
                type: boolean
              dateOfTermsOfUseConsent:
                type: string
                format: date-time
              termsOfUseConsent:
                type: boolean
    role:
      description: A user role Object
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        name:
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        roles:
          type: array
          description: Array of roles this role is inheriting from
          items:
            type: string
            pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        permissions:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        __v:
          type: integer
        displayName:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'  
    user_full:
      description: Data Transfer Object containing fully populated userdata
      type: object
      required:
        - firstName
        - lastName
        - email
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        __v:
          type: integer
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
          format: 'email'
        updatedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        birthday:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        preferences:
          type: object
          properties:
            firstLogin:
              type: boolean
          additionalProperties: true
        schoolId:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        roles:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/role'
        consent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/consent'
        forcePasswordChange:
          type: boolean
        fullName:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        avatarInitials:
          type: string
        avatarBackgroundColor:
          type: string
          pattern: '^#[0-9a-f]{6}$'
        age:
          type: integer
        displayName:
          type: string
        permissions:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        accountId:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        schoolName:
          type: string
        externallyManaged:
          type: boolean
          description: 'an externally managed user has been imported from an external IDM system,
            and cant be edited or deleted within the HPI-Schulcloud'


paths:
  /me:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user_full'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '403':
          description: forbidden
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves the currently logged in user.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - me
      security:
        - jwtBearer: []
  
openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: me
    description: A me service.
